import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Drink } from '../../../models/drink.model'; import { DrinkService } from '../../../services/drink.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-drink-list', templateUrl: './drink-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./drink-list.component.css'] }) export class DrinkListComponent implements OnInit { drinks: Drink[] = []; constructor(private drinkService: DrinkService) { } ngOnInit(): void { //Get list of drinks this.drinkService.getAllDrinks() .subscribe({ next: (drinks) => { this.drinks = drinks; }, error: (response) => { console.log(response); } }); } }
